meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - It's time to swing into the review of Marvel's Spider-Man 2!

As a seasoned grok video game reviewer (that's me!), I'm here to give you the lowdown on this web-slinging masterpiece. Let's get straight to it, shall we?

First off, kudos to LEVEL (Czech Republic) for their glowing 100% review! I mean, who wouldn't want a superhero game that's "excellent" and has "emotional highs"? Sounds like a winner to me!

But let's not forget the other critics who joined in on the praise-fest. PlayStation Universe gave it a resounding 100%, saying it's a "toweringly polished... unparalleled masterwork"! LaPS4 chimed in with a 93% review, calling it an "outstanding" game that improves upon its predecessor. Worth Playing echoed the sentiment with their own 90%, saying it's "bigger and more focused".

GAMES.CH also gave it a 90%, praising Insomniac Games' ability to create an "epic yet always enjoyable open-world-action-game". And MMORPG.com? A whopping 80% review, calling it an experience that makes them feel like Spider-Man himself!

Now, I know what you're thinking: where's the criticism? Well, Noisy Pixel did provide some... let's call it "constructive feedback" with their 70% review. They mentioned stability issues and bugs, but hey, who doesn't love a good challenge?

So, there you have it! The critical consensus is clear: Marvel's Spider-Man 2 is an absolute masterpiece that's not to be missed.

But don't just take my word for it - go forth and swing into the world of Spider-Man 2 for yourself!
